member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect
member.summary: Applies a 2D affine transform matrix to an image.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D 2D Affine transform effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Transform2DEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the Transform2DEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect.TransformMatrix
member.summary: Gets or sets the 3x2 affine transform matrix. Default value is the identity matrix.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Transform2D effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect.Sharpness
member.summary: When using high quality cubic interpolation mode, specifies the sharpness level of the scaling filter as a float between 0 and 1.
member.remarks: You can use sharpness to adjust the quality of image scaling. The sharpness factor affects the shape of the filter kernel. The higher the sharpness factor, the smaller the kernel.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect.BorderMode

member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of this CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0), and identity transform on the specified drawing session.
